app.mysql

Class MySqlConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.mysql.MySqlConnection

  • public class MySqlConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper class for a MySQL Server connection.

    Brady Houseknecht

    • Constructor Detail

      • MySqlConnection

        public MySqlConnection()
        Default class constructor.

      • MySqlConnection

        public MySqlConnection(java.lang.String server,
               java.lang.String database,
               java.lang.String port,
               java.lang.String username,
               java.lang.String password)
        Overloaded constructor that can be used to assign the defining attributes of the connection during initialization of the class.
        Parameters:
        server - string value equal to the target SQL Server
        database - string value equal to the target database
        username - string value equal to the user name to use for the connection
        password - string value equal to the password to use for the connection
